import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [divWidth, setDivWidth] = useState(containerStyles.width); const [divHeight, setDivHeight] = useState(containerStyles.height); const containerStyles = { "height": "300px", "width": "300px", "color": "green", "backgroundColor": "orange" } return (
); } export default App;
